node.title: 2. Give a Portion to Seven: Understanding Risk and Insurance
node.description: Living in a sinful world means that we all are at risk of emergencies and catastrophes that cost money.  How should a Christian respond to that reality?  Should we just rely on God working a miracle to provide for us?  Is it wrong or faithless to get insurance?  Is there something we can do for ourselves?  Does the God have any advice?  This presentation also specifically addresses the topic of Ellen White and life insurance.
